dcterms:description: The perovskite dataset was utilized to predict the formation energy of oxide perovskites using various machine learning models, and the results were compared with density functional theory calculations.
dcterms:title: Perovskite Dataset

dcterms:description: The MatBench database was referenced for benchmarking materials property prediction methods and was used to download and clean the perovskite dataset.
